title: Okta MFA Push Rejected (Potential Push Fatigue)
description: Detects Okta Verify push rejections which may indicate push fatigue attempts.
sigma:
title: Okta MFA Push Rejected (Potential Push Fatigue)
id: RULE-014
description: Detects Okta Verify push rejections which may indicate push fatigue attempts.
author: detpack-lab
status: experimental
logsource:
  product: okta
  service: system_log
detection:
  selection:
    eventType: user.mfa.okta_verify.push_rejected
    outcome.result: FAILURE
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - User legitimately rejecting unexpected push prompts
level: medium
tags:
  - attack.t1621
  - attack.credential_access
